description: Fresh, vibrant, crunchy and delicious Sugar Snap Pea Salad with a fresh and zingy lemon, mustard, garlic vinaigrette. It makes a great warm-weather side or light meal.
keywords: pea salad, snap pea salad, sugar snap pea recipe, sugar snap pea salad
name: Sugar Snap Pea Salad
recipeIngredient: 1 small clove garlic (, grated or minced finely)
4 tablespoons (60 mls) extra virgin olive oil (, see recipe notes for oil-free option)
1 3/4 cups (1 x 398 ml or 15 oz) can white beans (, such as cannelini, great northern, lima or gigante beans)
1 big handful fresh dill (, chopped (thick stems removed)

recipeInstructions.text: To a small bowl or jar, add the lemon juice, mustard, vinegar, garlic, olive oil, pepper and salt. Whisk to combine or pop a lid on the jar and give it a good shake.
Drain and rinse the beans and add to a large bowl.
Wash and chop the sugar snap peas into bite sized pieces (I cut mine in half or into 3 pieces if they were quite big) and add them to the bowl with the beans.
Chop the dill into small pieces and add to the beans and peas.
Pour over the vinaigrette and toss to combine. If you have time, leave it to sit for about 15 minutes before serving so the flavours can blend.
